Description: Unique identifier for the sample
Alternate code or name used at collection site
External accession IDs (BioSample, SRA, ENA), comma-separated
Anatomical or environmental site of origin
Material type of sample
Laterality of sample (left, right, NA)
Date of sample collection (ISO 8601, YYYY-MM-DD)
Number/label of visit or collection event
Unique subject/individual identifier (linked to subject table)
Unique identifier for associated (collection or extraction) center
Method used for sample collection
Brand/model/type of swab used for sample collection
Lot number of the swab used
Device identifier or lot number for collection device
Manufacturer and lot for swab/kit
Time from collection to processing (ISO 8601 Duration, e.g. PT2H30M)
Sample storage temperature after collection (with units, °C)
Method or reagent used for preservation
Replicate type
Identifier for batch, plate, and plate location
DNA/RNA concentration (with units, e.g., ng/µl)
Total volume or mass collected (with units, e.g., µl, mg)
Date of DNA/RNA extraction (ISO 8601, YYYY-MM-DD)
Brand/model of DNA extraction kit
Lot number for DNA extraction kit
Version or code/identifier of extraction protocol
Indicates host depletion step performed (yes or no)
Kit(s) used for host depletion
Details of any protocol modifications
Final elution volume (µl)
Measured DNA quantity (with units, e.g., ng, µg)
DNA quality control metrics (e.g., 260/280 ratio, fluorometric concentration)
